posts.post_content:
[IMG]http://i448.photobucket.com/albums/qq202/R42799/Practise_zpst0wboief.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i448.photobucket.com/albums/qq202/R42799/Out_zps7mhh8krs.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i448.photobucket.com/albums/qq202/R42799/consultation_zpsd8tt8qxf.jpg[/IMG]

The two SGC 10's have writing on the back and are postmarked with a stamp.  The practise postcard has some writing on the front, but still presents well  The Consultation postcard has not writing or postmark on the back.

In Consultation- Sold
Practise Makes Perfect- Sold
Out to the Long Green- sold
